name: Golf Cart Golf!
description:
Golf, Rocket League, and Dice had a baby! Play 3 hand crafted holes! Hit a dice with a golf cart at the pin. Score is added based on what side of the die it lands on. The lower the better! **Refresh to Play Twice**. Game/Art/Design made by Zac Marvin during the GMTK 2022 Jam. Audio made by Bronson Bragg during the jam! Big thanks to Bronson Bragg!

** My best score is 34! Score lower than that and record it and I'll venmo you 20 bucks haha! Its hard! Took me an hour to get that low.
